name: Ragnar Lodbrok
description: Look for this type of hero if you like Viking Warriors. He might spend time away from home, but he'll always come back with gold.

name: Batman
description: This is the hero for you if you like fast cars, danger and a nocturnal lifestyle.

name: Ironman
description: With this hero you'll have great adventures and you'll witness all the wonders of science!

name: Young Goku
description: This type of hero is on a great path. Choose one and watch his destiny unfold!
